name: Neon Shootout!
description:
Overview:

In this game, you shoot enemies... But the longer you live the harder it gets and since it gets harder you have to upgrade your player.

Controls:
  • Escape - menu
  • Click / Hold - shoot
  • Tab - open/close the upgrade menu
  • WASD - movement
Install instructions:
  1. Download .zip file
  2. Place the file in an empty folder
  3. Right-click .zip file > Extract here
  4. Double click "Neon Shootout .exe"
  5. Enjoy!
notes:
  • Pictures were made in Canva
  • The game stops getting harder after 12 minutes
